class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 17 - June 30, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Foundational course for the major and the minor that aims to perfect Spanish for oral and written communication through study and use of styles/registers, genres and rhetorical strategies.
